subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Richard Childress was fined $150,000 for assaulting Kyle Busch. Nascar also placed Childress on probation through the end of the year.
snippet: Richard Childress was fined $150,000 for assaulting Kyle Busch. Nascar also placed Childress on probation through the end of the year.
